      • initiateCapture

        public void initiateCapture(PtpipEventListener ptpipEventListener)
                     throws ThetaException
        Starts shooting.
        Parameters:
        ptpipEventListener - Event listener. If the listener is no longer needed after it is called, pass "null" in setPtpipEventListener(PtpipEventListener) to disable the listener so that it is no longer called.
        Throws:
        ThetaException - If remote shutter fails

      • setSleepDelay

        public void setSleepDelay(short second)
                   throws ThetaException
        Sets the sleep mode (seconds) of the camera.
        Parameters:
        second - 0: Auto sleep OFF, 1 to 29: 30 seconds, 30 to 1800: Specified number of seconds. An exception occurs if any other value is passed.
        Throws:
        ThetaException - In the case of second < 0 or 1800 < second

      • getSleepDelay

        public int getSleepDelay()
                  throws ThetaException
        Acquires the sleep mode (seconds) of the camera.
        Sleep mode is not activated if 0 is set.
        Returns:
        Time after which the camera enters sleep mode (seconds)
        Throws:
        ThetaException

      • getAutoPowerOffDelay

        public int getAutoPowerOffDelay()
                         throws ThetaException
        Acquires the auto power off setting of the camera (minutes).
        Auto power off is not set if 0 is set.
        Returns:
        Time after which auto power off occurs (minutes)
        Throws:
        ThetaException

      • setAutoPowerOffDelay

        public void setAutoPowerOffDelay(int minute)
                          throws ThetaException
        Sets the auto power off setting of the camera (minutes).
        0 to 30 (minutes) can be set
        Auto power off is not set if 0 is set.
        Parameters:
        minute - Time after which auto power off occurs (minutes)
        Throws:
        ThetaException

      • getShutterSpeed

        public ShutterSpeed getShutterSpeed()
                             throws ThetaException
        Acquires shutter speed.
        The data type is the same as the Exif 2.3 standard rational type. For example, (1, 8000) is 1/8000 of a second.
        Returns to default setting when power is turned off.
        Returns:
        Shutter speed
        Throws:
        ThetaException

      • setShutterSpeed

        public void setShutterSpeed(ShutterSpeed shutterSpeed)
                     throws ThetaException
        Sets shutter speed.
        The data type is the same as the Exif 2.3 standard rational type. For example, (1, 8000) is 1/8000 of a second.
        Returns to default setting when power is turned off.
        Parameters:
        shutterSpeed -
        Throws:
        ThetaException

      • setTimeLapseNumber

        public void setTimeLapseNumber(int timeLapseNumber)
                        throws ThetaException
        Sets maximum number of shots for interval shooting.
        No shooting limit is applied if 0x0000 is set.
        Returns to default setting when power is turned off.
        Parameters:
        timeLapseNumber - Maximum number of shots
        Throws:
        ThetaException

      • getTimeLapseNumber

        Throws:

      • setChannelNumber

        public void setChannelNumber(int channelNumber)
                      throws ThetaException
        Sets wireless LAN channel.
        Reflected when the Wi-Fi is turned OFF/ON.
        Random operation occurs if 0 is set.
        Parameters:
        channelNumber - Wireless LAN channel
        Throws:
        ThetaException

      • initiateOpenCapture

        public void initiateOpenCapture()
                         throws ThetaException
        Starts capture. Video (RICOH THETA m15) and interval.
        Throws:
        ThetaException

      • initiateOpenCapture

        public void initiateOpenCapture(PtpipEventListener ptpipEventListener)
                         throws ThetaException
        Starts capture. Video (RICOH THETA m15) and interval.
        If the listener is no longer needed after it is called, pass "null" in setPtpipEventListener(PtpipEventListener) to disable the listener so that it is no longer called.
        Parameters:
        ptpipEventListener - Event listener
        Throws:
        ThetaException

      • terminateOpenCapture

        public void terminateOpenCapture()
                          throws ThetaException
        Ends continuous shooting.
        Throws:
        ThetaException

      • wlanPowerControl

        public void wlanPowerControl()
                      throws ThetaException
        Turns Wi-Fi OFF.
        Throws:
        ThetaException

        public int getRecordingTime()

      • setAudioVolume

        public void setAudioVolume(int volume)
                    throws ThetaException
        Sets shutter sound volume of connected camera
        Returns to default setting (100%) when power is turned off.
        0% to 100% can be set
        Parameters:
        volume - Shutter sound volume (%)
        Throws:
        ThetaException
